events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue clearly indicates a refund request related to a recent purchase due to sizing problems.
Support agent Julia has been assigned to handle the refund request for this customer case.
Hello! This is Julia from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you mentioned.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm whether the item has been opened or worn?
Sure, my order number is 4587321. The jacket hasn’t been worn outside, only tried on once at home.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process and email you a prepaid return label within the next hour.
Thanks for your prompt response and clear instructions! I appreciate the quick help.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed. Please allow 3-5 business days for the funds to appear in your account.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting us!
